ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 1996-1460 which would add "responding to research needs that support ongoing joint federal-provincial policy development on student financial assistance" to the list of purposes for which the Special Investment Fund may be used.
